attributes.additional_details: If you do not get rid of ofsted you will find very soon, that no one wants to be a teacher anymore. So then what will the British government do to ensure our children get a good quality education in the 3rd millennium AD and the 21st century? We are not living in the dark ages, despite what ofsted might think.
attributes.background: Ofsted is not fit for purpose. It absolutely demoralises teachers and the whole teaching profession.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635116
